components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 7 days until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We expect to provide another update in next 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We expect to provide another update in next 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently facing delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 7 days until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with A2P 10DLC campaign reviews, facing delays due to high volume. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have additional information.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our Voice carrier partner in Israel is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 February 2023 at 14:00 PST until 13 February 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Twilio Israel phone numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: The Beeline Network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance From 14 February 2023 at 06:00 PST until 14 February 2023 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window. There could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - 3ID

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner 3ID is conducting an emergency maintenance from 14 February 2023 at 09:00 PST until 14 February 2023 at 13:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Indonesia
Impacted Products - Carrier
Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3ID

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 01 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 27 February 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

01 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 01 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
06 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 06 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
08 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 08 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
13 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 13 February 2023 at 16:00 PST
